Privacy Policy

WhatTheStack

Last updated: April 30, 2025

Data Collection

The WhatTheStack Chrome extension does NOT collect, store, or transmit any of the following:

  • Personal user data
  • Browsing history or visited URLs
  • Cookies, IP addresses, or technical identifiers
  • Usage analytics or metrics

All functionality runs locally in the user's browser. The extension does not communicate with any external servers.

Its only function is to detect the technology stack of the currently viewed website based on publicly accessible data (e.g., HTTP headers, DOM structure).

Data Security

Since no personal data is collected or transmitted, there are no associated security risks or vulnerabilities related to user data.
